messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I've lived in this constituency for over 35 years and teach in a local school. It is a wonderful place to live, but like so many of you, I'm concerned about the plans for huge unsustainable housing developments on green fields all around our towns and villages.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Concerned about plans for huge unsustainable housing developments on green fields around towns and villages.

housing.content: Concerned about the plans for huge unsustainable housing developments on green fields all around our towns and villages.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in this constituency for over 35 years and teach in a local school.

quotes.text: If you want a local MP who puts YOU first, rather than a Westminster party loyalist, vote Adrian Baker.

images.caption: ADRIAN BAKER in Hertford and Stortford
